ygData.subject: RE: Bugs Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 827
ygData.msgSnippet: I remember back when I downloaded LoY and I had a dailup connection at that time and I couldn t play for more than 5 minutes without the game booting me off
ygData.messageBody:
I remember back when I downloaded LoY and I had a dailup connection at that time and I couldn't play for more than 5 minutes without the game booting me off and having the screen YOU HAVE BEEN DISCONNECTED pop up.  This happened for about a week and a half until I got DSL.  I asked the GMs and tech people for help but all they could tell me was everything on the everquest website.  Prior to having downloaded LoY the game worked fine on my dailup connection, everything was ok.  I gotta tell you some of these people who work at tech assist have no idea what they are talking about and they don't listen to what you are saying.  Well thats my 2cp.
 
Dabruiser Troll
Warrior of the 29th Season
-----Original Message-----
From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
Sent: Sunday, August 31, 2003 7:17 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Bugs Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 827

Speaking of bugs...
I was at the chat waiting for error 1018 to clear and the GM was saying that
there is a known issue with dialup not letting people past character select.
There are people with dialup accounts who haven't been able to login for 2
months now.
I'm interested in hearing about other bug as well. I'm thinking of compiling
a list.
luv,
-Su

> I've never had to hail the NPC to turn in quest stuff, but I usually did
to
> make sure I had the NPC I was looking for. I'd also say it could be a bug,
> but we all know there isn't any bugs in EQ.
>
> Damasciss Kyndhart
